title: mzPeak metadata file description
description: Describe the JSON format of the file description section

contents.description: Parameters describing the contents of the file, such as types of spectra. Analogous to https://peptideatlas.org/tmp/mzML1.1.0.html#fileContent

source_files.description: List of all files used as data sources for this mzPeak file. Analogous to https://peptideatlas.org/tmp/mzML1.1.0.html#sourceFileList

source_file.description: A data file that was read in order to produce this mzPeak file. Analogous to https://peptideatlas.org/tmp/mzML1.1.0.html#sourceFile

id.description: A unique identifier for this source file.

name.description: The name of the source file, not including parent directory

location.description: The path to the source file, URI encoded. This may include file:// protocols and UNC paths

parameters.description: Additional parameters describing this source file, like checksums, nativeID format, or file format
